DOC.brief_summary: This project develop preliminarily evaluate intervention assist young-middle adult rural breast cancer survivor overcome functional impairment related cancer treatment . Younger breast cancer survivor ( age 60 ) ongoing family , social vocational responsibility recreational interest increase risk develop long-term difficulty perform value activity ( participation restriction ) . Rural cancer survivor medically underserved due distance geographic isolation face significant barrier access traditional rehabilitation service . Alternative rehabilitation approach sorely need population . Based previous research cancer medical population work draft treatment manual use telephone-delivered Behavioral Activation Problem Solving ( BA/PS ) intervention design . Prior test intervention randomize clinical trial , additional work must complete . The specific aim study a. refine BA/PS treatment manual , b. develop apply treatment integrity measure BA/PS manual , c. ass participation restriction associate outcomes , d. preliminarily assess immediate maintenance effect BA/PS , e. examine mediator moderator BA/PS effect base `` Self Regulation '' model functional recovery . 188 young-middle adult breast cancer survivor screen participation restriction follow cancer treatment 40 survivor participation restriction receive BA/PS deliver phone . BA/PS participant assess treatment effectiveness interview regard experience treatment provide information refining manual . The long-term objective line research develop effective feasible treatment medical psychosocial consequence cancer treatment medically underserved cancer survivor ( e.g. , rural population ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female breast cancer patient stage IIII . 2 . Age 1859 . 3 . Completion definitive breast cancer treatment ( i.e. , subsequent locoregional surgical treatment completion adjuvant neoadjuvant chemotherapy without radiation ) within past 36 month . 4 . Screen positive moderate bad level participation restriction ( Work Social Adjustment Scale score > 10 ) within 6 month follow cancer treatment . 5 . English speaking . 6 . Have landbased phone reliable cell phone reception . 1 . Noncorrectable hearing loss . 2 . Moderatesevere cognitive impairment indicate score < 3 6item cognitive screener . 3 . Medical record documentation severe mental illness ( i.e. , schizophrenia bipolar disorder ) active substance abuse . 4 . Medical record documentation physical disorder associate functional impairment ( e.g. , Parkinson 's disease , stroke , congestive heart failure , etc . ) .
